detail_desc: Fitted top in softly draping, fine-ribbed jersey made from a silk blend with extra-long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved body in ribbed jersey made from a Tencel™lyocell blend with a deep neckline and press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved body in ribbed jersey made from a Tencel™lyocell blend with a deep neckline and press-studs at the crotch.
Fine rib-knit dress in soft merino wool with a polo neck and wide turn-ups at the cuffs.
Fitted top in soft, rib-knit wool containing some cashmere with a round neck and long sleeves.
Fitted top in soft, rib-knit wool containing some cashmere with a round neck and long sleeves.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with elastication at the back of the waist, fake back pockets and tapered legs with creases. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Fitted, knee-length dress in a soft, rib-knit wool and cashmere blend with a deep V-neck front and back and long, wide sleeves that taper at the cuffs.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Pockets in the side seams, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening, and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside. Some of the cotton content of the joggers is organic.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour side panels and a small print on one leg. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and a pocket with a taped zip at one side. Tapered legs with ribbed hems. The polyester content of the joggers is recycled.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour side panels and a small print on one leg. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and a pocket with a taped zip at one side. Tapered legs with ribbed hems. The polyester content of the joggers is recycled.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour side panels and a small print on one leg. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and a pocket with a taped zip at one side. Tapered legs with ribbed hems. The polyester content of the joggers is recycled.
Jacket in woven fabric with a filling of 80% down and 20% feathers. Stand-up collar, a two-way zip down the front, front pockets and a detachable tie belt. Lined.

Boxy jacket in nylon with a filling of 80% down and 20% feathers. Lined, drawstring hood and a two-way zip down the front. Patch pockets with a flap and one inner pocket. Long raglan sleeves with inner ribbing at the cuffs. Slightly longer and gently rounded at the back. Lined.

Straight-cut, calf-length dress in a woven silk blend with a small stand-up collar, buttons at the top and yoke with a pleat at the back. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and sewn-in ties at the front of the waist. Overlapping side seams and slits in the sides. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Long-sleeved V-neck top in softly draping viscose jersey.
Long-sleeved V-neck top in softly draping viscose jersey.
Long-sleeved V-neck top in softly draping viscose jersey.
Long-sleeved V-neck top in softly draping viscose jersey.

Oversized hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton and recycled polyester blend. Extra-large, double-layered, drawstring hood, a kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Oversized hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton and recycled polyester blend. Extra-large, double-layered, drawstring hood, a kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Straight-cut blouse in an airy cotton weave with buttons down the front and a large, double-layered collar with a narrow frill trim. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Straight-cut blouse in an airy cotton weave with buttons down the front and a large, double-layered collar with a narrow frill trim. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Short, A-line dress in an airy cotton weave with a smocked section at the top framed by a flounced trim front and back. Voluminous, 3/4-length puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, and ties at the back of the neck. Unlined.

Short, A-line dress in woven fabric with a round, gathered neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length raglan balloon sleeves with narrow trims, and a gathered seam for added width in the skirt. Unlined.
Cropped sleeveless top in cotton jersey with a text print at the top.
Cropped sleeveless top in cotton jersey with a text print at the top.
Cropped sleeveless top in cotton jersey with a text print at the top.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist. Leg pockets, one of which has a text print, tapered legs with sewn-in creases at the front and ribbed hems.
Straight-cut shirt in soft cotton poplin with a collar and buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Straight-cut shirt in soft cotton poplin with a collar and buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Studio Collection. Flip-flops in recycled polyester with padded foot straps and ties that can be fastened around the ankles. Soles made from BLOOM™ algae foam. BLOOM™ is a foam material made partly from algae biomass. The innovative manufacturing process used for this material helps to clean and restore the environment.
Pyjamas with a long-sleeved shirt and pair of bottoms in soft satin. Shirt with a V-neck, collar and buttons down the front. Bottoms with covered elastication at the waist and wide, straight legs.
Pyjamas with a long-sleeved shirt and pair of bottoms in soft satin. Shirt with a V-neck, collar and buttons down the front. Bottoms with covered elastication at the waist and wide, straight legs.

Straight-cut, knee-length dress in softly draping satin with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening with a concealed button at the front. Detachable tie belt at the waist, 3/4-length sleeves and cuffs with a shiny metal button. Unlined.

Blouse in soft lace made from a cotton blend with a stand-up collar and gathers at the top to create soft draping front and back. Opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves, cuffs with covered buttons, and a gently rounded hem.

Blouse in soft lace made from a cotton blend with a stand-up collar and gathers at the top to create soft draping front and back. Opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves, cuffs with covered buttons, and a gently rounded hem.

Blouse in soft lace made from a cotton blend with a stand-up collar and gathers at the top to create soft draping front and back. Opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves, cuffs with covered buttons, and a gently rounded hem.

Short, A-line dress in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Round neckline and an opening at the back with narrow ties at the back of the neck. Long, voluminous puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, dropped shoulders and long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Oversized jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with a deep V-neck, low dropped shoulders and wide, extra-long, sleeves. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Oversized jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with a deep V-neck, low dropped shoulders and wide, extra-long, sleeves. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Oversized jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with a deep V-neck, low dropped shoulders and wide, extra-long, sleeves. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.

Short dress in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Relaxed fit with gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a tab and button. Gathered seam at the waist and a wide, softly draping skirt. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. High waist with wide, elasticated ribbing. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. High waist with wide, elasticated ribbing. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. High waist with wide, elasticated ribbing. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. High waist with wide, elasticated ribbing. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Block-coloured hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a flock print on the front, extra-wide neckline and jersey-lined hood. Long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Kids Exclusive. Long-sleeved tops in soft, ribbed, organic cotton jersey with a button placket and scalloped trims around the neckline, button band and cuffs.
Block-coloured top in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.
Block-coloured top in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.
Lightly padded, quilted shopper in a recycled polyester weave with two handles and a zip at the top and one inner compartment. Lined. Height 28 cm. Width 45 cm.

Pyjamas with a top and pair of shorts in soft jersey made from a cotton blend. Top with a lace-covered V-neck and short sleeves. Shorts with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist. Overlocked edges around the sleeves and hems.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a text print on the front.
Scrunchie covered in soft velour.

Knee-length dress in satin crêpe with a small stand-up collar with gathers and covered buttons down to the waist. Long, wide raglan sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs, an asymmetric seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Knee-length dress in satin crêpe with a small stand-up collar with gathers and covered buttons down to the waist. Long, wide raglan sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs, an asymmetric seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Knee-length dress in satin crêpe with a small stand-up collar with gathers and covered buttons down to the waist. Long, wide raglan sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs, an asymmetric seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a round neckline, press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and text print on the front.

Playsuit in stretch cotton twill with a smocked bodice and a square neckline with a small frill trim. Short puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and hems, pockets in the side seams and short, wide legs.
Wide, straight-cut hoodie in cotton jersey with dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves.
Wide, straight-cut hoodie in cotton jersey with dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves.
Ankle-length dress in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Oversized tunic in a cotton weave with a V-shaped opening at the front and small stand-up collar with narrow ties that can be adjusted with buttons. Low dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and wide cuffs with narrow ties and adjustable buttoning. Pleat at the back for added width, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Tops in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a round neckline and butterfly sleeves with flatlock hems.
Tops in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a round neckline and butterfly sleeves with flatlock hems.
Short, boxy cardigan in a soft, fluffy knit with a V-neck, rhinestone-decorated buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft fluffy knit with a collar and wrapover V-neck, extra-long balloon sleeves with wide, ribbed cuffs, and ribbing at the hem.
V-neck slipover in a soft cable knit with ribbing around the neckline and hem. Relaxed fit.

Jumper in a soft cable knit containing some wool with a square neckline and wide, rib-knit flounce over the shoulders. Long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Jumper in a soft cable knit containing some wool with a square neckline and wide, rib-knit flounce over the shoulders. Long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Short, fitted skirt in patterned jersey. High waist with concealed elastication, and a slit at the front of the hem.
Short, fitted skirt in patterned jersey. High waist with concealed elastication, and a slit at the front of the hem.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in cotton corduroy with a high waist and zip fly and button.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist, zipped front pockets and a fake back pocket. Tapered legs with text-print side stripes and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Necklace with three metal chains in different lengths, one with a drop-shaped pendant and one with a bar-shaped pendant. Adjustable length.
